message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is highly valued by many of our customers. It's worth more than $100 to us, and I believe it could be a valuable addition to your collection. Considering its quality and the benefits it offers, I am proposing a special introductory price of $150 for you. This is an exclusive offer, and I hope you'll find it compelling. If you have any questions or need more information, please let me know. I look forward to hearing your response!
